description:
A collection of 200+ analyzers for C#, powered by Roslyn.

  - This package is dependent on Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspaces 3.5.0.

diagnostics.title: Add braces (when expression spans over multiple lines).
diagnostics.messageFormat: Add braces to {0} (when expression spans over multiple lines).

diagnostics.title: Add braces to if-else (when expression spans over multiple lines).
diagnostics.messageFormat: Add braces to if-else (when expression spans over multiple lines).

diagnostics.title: Use explicit type instead of 'var' (when the type is not obvious).
Use explicit type instead of 'var' (foreach variable).
Use 'var' instead of explicit type (when the type is obvious).
Use explicit type instead of 'var' (when the type is obvious).
Avoid implicitly-typed array.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Declare explicit type when creating an array.

diagnostics.title: Avoid multiline expression body.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Expand expression body with multiline expression.

diagnostics.title: Remove empty line between closing brace and switch section.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Remove empty line between closing brace and switch section.

diagnostics.title: Remove 'partial' modifier from type with a single part.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Remove 'partial' modifier from type with a single part.

diagnostics.title: Remove original exception from throw statement.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Remove original exception from throw statement.

diagnostics.title: Rename private field to camel case with underscore.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Rename private field to camel case with underscore.

diagnostics.title: Do not rename private static read-only field to camel case with underscore.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Do not rename private static read-only field to camel case with underscore.

diagnostics.title: Asynchronous method name should end with 'Async'.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Add suffix 'Async' to asynchronous method name.

diagnostics.title: Non-asynchronous method name should not end with 'Async'.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Remove suffix 'Async' from non-asynchronous method name.

diagnostics.title: Non-asynchronous method name should not end with 'Async'.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Remove suffix 'Async' from non-asynchronous method name.

diagnostics.title: Use lambda expression instead of anonymous method.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Use lambda expression instead of anonymous method.

diagnostics.title: Use lambda expression instead of anonymous method.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Use lambda expression instead of anonymous method.

diagnostics.title: Add argument list to object creation expression (or vice versa).
diagnostics.messageFormat: Add argument list to object creation expression.

diagnostics.title: Remove argument list from object creation expression.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Remove argument list from object creation expression.

diagnostics.title: Remove parentheses from condition of conditional expression (when condition is a single token).
diagnostics.messageFormat: Remove parentheses from condition of conditional expression (when condition is a single token).

diagnostics.title: Avoid semicolon at the end of declaration.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Remove semicolon from the end of declaration.

diagnostics.title: Avoid usage of using alias directive.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Avoid usage of using alias directive.

diagnostics.title: Avoid locking on publicly accessible instance.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Lock on private field instead of locking on '{0}'.

diagnostics.title: Declare each type in separate file.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Declare each type in separate file.

diagnostics.title: Avoid usage of do statement to create an infinite loop.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Use while statement to create an infinite loop.

diagnostics.title: Avoid usage of for statement to create an infinite loop.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Use while statement to create an infinite loop.

diagnostics.title: Avoid usage of while statement to create an inifinite loop.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Use for statement to create an infinite loop.

diagnostics.title: Avoid empty catch clause that catches System.Exception.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Avoid empty catch clause that catches System.Exception.

diagnostics.title: Throwing of new NotImplementedException.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Implement the functionality instead of throwing new NotImplementedException.

diagnostics.title: Use coalesce expression instead of conditional expression.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Use coalesce expression instead of conditional expression.

diagnostics.title: Declare using directive on top level.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Declare using directive on top level.

diagnostics.title: Convert 'HasFlag' call to bitwise operation (or vice versa).
Convert 'HasFlag' call to bitwise operation (or vice versa).
Avoid 'null' on the left side of a binary expression.
diagnostics.messageFormat: 'null' should be on the right side of a binary expression.

diagnostics.title: Default label should be the last label in a switch section.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Move default label to the last position in a switch section.

diagnostics.title: Format documentation summary on a single line.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Format documentation summary on a single line.

diagnostics.title: Format documentation summary on multiple lines.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Format documentation summary on multiple lines.

diagnostics.title: Simplify conditional expression (when it includes negation of condition).
diagnostics.messageFormat: Simplify conditional expression (when it includes negation of condition).

diagnostics.title: Add 'static' modifier to all partial class declarations.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Add 'static' modifier to all partial class declarations.

diagnostics.title: Add braces to switch section with multiple statements.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Add braces to switch section with multiple statements.

diagnostics.title: Bitwise operation on enum without Flags attribute.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Bitwise operation on enum without Flags attribute.

diagnostics.title: Declare enum member with zero value (when enum has FlagsAttribute).
diagnostics.messageFormat: Declare enum member with zero value (when enum has FlagsAttribute).

diagnostics.title: Merge switch sections with equivalent content.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Merge switch sections with equivalent content.

diagnostics.title: Add summary element to documentation comment.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Add summary element to documentation comment.

diagnostics.title: Use string.Length instead of comparison with empty string.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Use string.Length instead of comparison with empty string.

diagnostics.title: Composite enum value contains undefined flag.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Composite enum value contains undefined flag {0}.

diagnostics.title: Static member in generic type should use a type parameter.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Static member in generic type should use a type parameter.

diagnostics.title: Abstract type should not have public constructors.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Abstract type should not have public constructors.

diagnostics.title: Unconstrained type parameter checked for null.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Unconstrained type parameter checked for null.

diagnostics.title: Value type object is never equal to null.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Value type object is never equal to null.

diagnostics.title: Parameter name differs from base name.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Parameter name '{0}' differs from base name '{1}'.

diagnostics.title: Use 'var' instead of explicit type (when the type is not obvious).
Use 'var' instead of explicit type (in foreach).
Use Regex instance instead of static method.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Use Regex instance instead of static method.

diagnostics.title: Declare enum value as combination of names.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Declare enum value as combination of names.

diagnostics.title: Unnecessary usage of verbatim string literal.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Unnecessary usage of verbatim string literal.

diagnostics.title: Overriding member should not change 'params' modifier.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Overriding member should not change 'params' modifier.

diagnostics.title: Call extension method as instance method.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Call extension method as instance method.

diagnostics.title: Avoid unnecessary boxing of value type.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Avoid unnecessary boxing of value type.

diagnostics.title: Avoid unnecessary boxing of value type.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Avoid unnecessary boxing of value type.

diagnostics.title: Order named arguments according to the order of parameters.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Order named arguments according to the order of parameters.

diagnostics.title: Use conditional access instead of conditional expression.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Use conditional access instead of conditional expression.

diagnostics.title: Convert anonymous function to method group.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Convert anonymous function to method group.

diagnostics.title: Convert anonymous function to method group.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Convert anonymous function to method group.

diagnostics.title: Return Task.FromResult instead of returning null.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Return Task.FromResult instead of returning null.

diagnostics.title: Expression is always equal to true/false.
Use pattern matching instead of combination of 'is' operator and cast operator.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Use pattern matching instead of combination of 'is' operator and cast operator.

diagnostics.title: Use pattern matching instead of combination of 'as' operator and null check.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Use pattern matching instead of combination of 'as' operator and null check.

diagnostics.title: Mark publicly visible type with DebuggerDisplay attribute.
Do not pass non-read-only struct by read-only reference.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Do not pass non-read-only struct by read-only reference.

diagnostics.title: Do not use element access when expression is invocation.
diagnostics.messageFormat: Do not use element access when expression is invocation.
